summary: A utility that retrieves an image from a data dictionary using a configurable key and computes its statistical metadata—such as dimensionality, spacing, intensity range, mean and variance—returning these values in a structured "image_stats" entry. It supports both raw NumPy arrays and MONAI MetaTensor objects, applying a default unit spacing when explicit spacing is unavailable.
business_intent: Facilitate automated data profiling and quality assurance in medical imaging pipelines by providing readily accessible image characteristics that can guide preprocessing decisions, model configuration, and validation reporting.
